website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option for a wireless barcode scanner meant for anyone needing a basic replacement.
pros: Wireless and wired capabilities offer more options for connecting the scanner to a computer for the best possible results
cons: Scanner sometimes fails to scan the complete barcode, resulting in mixed results in accuracy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in under 90 days
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product on June 28, 2018 and in under 90 days it stopped scanning. The scanner functions however it does not read the barcode any longer. That's pretty pathetic for such a short time. Buyer Beware, do not purchase!!! We sent an email to the seller about the problem and never received a response.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Dekelaita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wireless bar codes scanner for inventory in my library. I looked at ones for $300 but that isn't in my budget. I saw reviews that said I could use this one with Destiny. When I got the scanner, I worked at home for four days scanning and clearing bar code programs. I contacted woneNICE and received a reply that night. They sent the correct bar codes for me to scan to get the wand to work! I couldn't be happier. I have a wand that works and I paid a fraction of what I would have paid for one that was programmed for Destiny! I highly recommend this lightweight, wireless, bar code scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Just Jo

customer_reviews.title: Totally happy with the range, ease of use, programability, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Came with a bunch of barcodes printed in a small manual, for some customization of common features, like adding or taking away the <Enter> key automatically appended to each scan. That alone was very handy. Works well, consistent, very good battery life for my fairly light to moderate use. You'd have to be using it all day long constantly I think, before you might have to charge it once during the day or maybe not. I basically go and go and use it each day and don't think about it. I've misplaced mine during summer break and if I can't find it, I'm going to order another one. An excellent value for the features and how well it works!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Best scanner I've used so far
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is excellent in every aspect. Tons of features and has yet to disappoint me in any way. The charge lasts much longer than expected. The plastic card to scan in order to switch between the most used functions is very handy. This needs to be "Amazons Choice", not the previous scanner I bought that made me want to take a sledgehammer to it.
customer_reviews.author: KS_EZ

customer_reviews.title: Limited Settings!
customer_reviews.text: Received the barcode and very disappointed! It has very limited settings. No way to set it up, so that it doesn’t read the last digit of the barcode. Becomes useless, when our scanner and barcodes are scanned into database without the last digit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice scanner, support is supper,
customer_reviews.text: needed to scan into a excel sheet, could not modify the sheet but i needed a multi cell jump after a bar code was scanned. emailed the support group and they sent me the correct programing bar code and now when i need to use that sheet i scan the program codes and go to work, good scanner, great support, i would recommend
customer_reviews.author: wobadman

customer_reviews.title: This unit works great. I modified it to return a "tab" instead ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great. I modified it to return a "tab" instead of the default "enter" so I could capture serial numbers and asset tags in an excel spreadsheet across the page. I have found that pointing it a 30-45 degree angle seems to pick up the bar codes better than directly at them. I have purchased 3 total after experimenting with the first one.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Great technical support for a great scanner!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a scanner that was programmable and this fit the bill. I have had several interactions with the merchant about my programming needs and they promptly responded and supplied the barcodes for me to program the scanner for my specific needs... they have been awesome, highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Likes It

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for scanning barcodes.
customer_reviews.text: This barcode scanner has been working flawlessly. I needed a scanner that could read very small barcodes. After printing my barcode that is three quarters of an inch tall and 1 inch long I am able to scan the barcodes with no difficulty. This scanner is very inexpensive and works quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L Williams

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scanner for work. I was getting a large shipment of computers in and needed an easy way of tracking/assigning them. The scanner did exactly what I needed it to do. I was able to scan the barcode on the box which exported to a excel spreadsheet. It is still very new so I'm not quite sure how good the battery life is. But so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Just Works. No software needed on Win 7
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Wireless works great. Used it for work to scan some serial numbers into an excel spreadsheet. I used the instant upload mode and it worked perfectly. It turned about an hours worth of data entry into about 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Solid, fast, gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why anyone would spend any more money on a 1D scanner. We used this scanner to create an inventory of thousands of pieces of furniture from scratch. It's also solidly constructed, light-weight and has all the programmable options and and onboard storage that you could possibly need in a 100,000+ sq ft office building.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: My Experience
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner! Easy to setup. It worked the way it was supposed to with no problems. When scanning barcode including numbers and letters, there is no way to program this particular scanner to read only numbers. So I would have to go back and delete letters. Could be used wirelessly or plugged in to your laptop. I did not call tech support so that's the reason for no rating on that part.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart King

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I work in a small library, this is super handy because it is cordless. I've had it for a while now and its still working great. The only problem is it has a difficult time reading barcodes on colored backgrounds. But it works as well as any I have used before.
customer_reviews.author: kittledee

customer_reviews.title: I wish I'd bought this first
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little scanner and has worked better than the wired one I bought a couple of years ago. It has been easy to customize the volume and scanning to our needs. It's mostly being used for inventory, but not far away from the computer where it's plugged in, so I'm not sure about total range. For the money, I'm really pleased. Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: F. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works well and the battery lasts a long time. You can turn the beeping off so that's definitely a place. I'm currently using it to catelog my library.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Isn’t consistent with scanning. Will work great for a while and then suddenly it won’t scan. I bought if for my classroom Ibrary.
customer_reviews.author: Mel P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Quality and performance exactly like you would expect. I'm glad I purchased it for my business. Thx!!! If you want one to use with your phone to scan items in stores get one that works with Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaBull

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a year ago to scan club members at check in. It has worked perfectly the entire time. I am very pleased with this purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described works great
customer_reviews.text: used for over a month before writing review no issues. works great
customer_reviews.author: 99reviews

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a month!
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the quality is extremely poor. Broke within the month.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian H.

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for selling online products!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for the price. It does what it says it will do and is basically a plug and play device.
customer_reviews.author: dalehan123

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Nice, practical unit. I like the bluetooth wireless mode. It saves me time!
customer_reviews.author: JasonD

customer_reviews.title: battery life sucks
customer_reviews.text: All of the scanners I've purchased are not as described, the battery life stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Kelmichel

customer_reviews.title: Works in libraries that use Destiny
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. It doesn’t scan as fast as my Follett scanner but for 1/10 of the cost it was so worth it. I connectvit up to my Mac open Destiny and start scanning.
customer_reviews.author: Abbi Whitt

customer_reviews.title: Wonenice works
customer_reviews.text: Once I did it right with the receiver installed in USB socket the scanner worked. Now I need to find a software program to manage my book collection information.
customer_reviews.author: edward j penn

customer_reviews.title: An amazingly good value
customer_reviews.text: This may sound strange, bu I've used bar codes for years around the rouse, for everything from keeping track of ac adaptors to keeping track of a larged dvd collection. When my ancient PSC scanner died on me recently I found this one for a very low price and I am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Gary in Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Scanner
customer_reviews.text: The library bought this for our secondary checkout station and it works wonderfully. Even the kids can operate the scanner. It is so nice not to have so many cords on the checkout desk. Great scanner!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and works out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Cost effective highly operational right out of the box. If you have a question, e-mail turn around is quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cool beans
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. I've never used one of these before, so not much to compare to. But i'm happy with this purchase. The product works well, feels good in your hand. There are MANY settings it has, which I will probably never use. But maybe you will.
customer_reviews.author: inc919

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I am an amazon book seller and this scanner has sped up my listing time TREMENDOUSLY! After lots of research, I found this product to be the BEST VALUE
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Houlihan

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scanner to use for tool inventory. The ease of use and the versatility of it makes cataloging much easier
customer_reviews.author: Michael Collins

customer_reviews.title: Do more research find better products do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap barcode scanner especially for a business and this is not what it was described or how it was manufacture extremely cheap
customer_reviews.author: T. Clark

customer_reviews.title: quick scan  and sturdy design battery last pretty long
customer_reviews.text: very quick scanner I am enjoying it. Battery last pretty long almost a week
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Saeed

customer_reviews.title: Great value good product
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner for quick 1D scans. Use at packing station in a warehouse to call up orders. Very durable and almost always read on the 1st scan.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Make life easier!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to check-in and out my classroom library books. It is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: does a great job
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it for home inventory, it scan's like a champ. I'm really loving it.
customer_reviews.author: MartiB

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: shaves so much time off of entering barcodes by hand! a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: carly5toes

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Works right out of the box. Love it, no cord to get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: sumler reader

customer_reviews.title: Does not work anymore
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and at first it would read all the bar codes. Now when i store them it will read 90% of them and the rest will now be recorded. It's weird because when i scan it, it beeps but when i go upload it will sometimes not show it. Also it will show that i have 100 on the memory but when i upload it, maybe 90 will actually record. Do not buy this if you want all accurate readings stored on the memory.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it
customer_reviews.text: Very slow to scan, and has a REALLY hard time reading any bar code that is on a shiny plastic material.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Evans

customer_reviews.title: Reliable scanner at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use in my library. It works much better than the “heavy duty” one our school district provided. Buy this with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Barchester

customer_reviews.title: Needs to need of a middle school classroom
customer_reviews.text: The scanner has been great using it with my classroom and have had no issues
customer_reviews.author: A. YEATON

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but doesn't like metal shelving or you (at long distances) in between it and the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plug and play. Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for picking orders for my website. Was plug and play integration, could not have been any easier. Bluetooth will reach all the way across my warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Does not work after 6 months and min use
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as an extra scanner and after only 8 months of very minimal use, maybe an hour a day 4 days a week, it will not hold a charge at all so is completely useless. The cord is not long enough to leave plugged in and use so I now have to order a new scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and nice grip. We had thousands of books to scan, and this did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Craig

customer_reviews.title: Wireless/Bluetooth Feature is Really Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far to scan 30 barcodes. It worked well. It’s major feature, for me, is the wireless/Bluetooth. It allowed me to scan without being tethered to my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: does not scan barcode properly
customer_reviews.text: does not work properly. takes too long to scan the barcode. have to make several attempts to scan the barcode
customer_reviews.author: Rishi Patel

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: This product needs better instructions on how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Carty

customer_reviews.title: Great quality,  best purchase I've made for inventory. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This product makes inventory so much easier. Since we started using this scanner we can check our customers out faster. Great quality for the price. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina D

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: For control of the stock is perfect, and work great
customer_reviews.author: Marco V. Ruiz Chacon

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a short while ago and it already stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Mc

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I highly recommend it. Easy to use and install on your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Will1825

customer_reviews.title: Cordless scanner does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for my online selling business; an excellent scanner with Bluetooth tech (go cordless) - great value as well!
customer_reviews.author: harv banning

customer_reviews.title: USB Barcode Scanner
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered as described all the pieces and manual were in the box. No complaints and easy setup
customer_reviews.author: Lola Holley

customer_reviews.title: Plug & Play
customer_reviews.text: talk about plug and play Wow. I was able to unbox it plug it in to my PC and immediately start working
customer_reviews.author: Paulo G Morales

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The product works really well, easy to set up and easy to use: this really help improve the business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We are using in a factory environment. We have had no issues with them, drivers install automatically, scanners have a very good range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I plugged it into my Windows 7 desktop and it worked right away.
customer_reviews.author: ejao

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient to use. I love the Blue color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Romyben

customer_reviews.title: Scans slowly or not at all.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it does not scan barcodes quickly. Sometimes it wouldn't scan at all.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Dearing

customer_reviews.title: plugged in and worked flawless
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great produce, was fully charged and ready to go right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our central receiving area. Works great Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has a long battery life. Recommend to anyone needing a scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

product_meta.title: WoneNice Barcode Scanner Wireless 2-in-1 (2.4Ghz Wireless+USB 2.0 Wired) Handheld Bar Code Scanner Reader with USB Receiver for Store, Supermarket, Warehouse
product_meta.description:
Specifications: 
Frequency: 2.4GHz 
CPU: ARM 32-bit Cortex 
Charging Supply: 5V 500mA 
Current: 15-40mA (Working); 18uA-5mA (Standby) 
Battery: Built-in 1500mA Lithium Battery 
Working Time: 7 to 10 Days 
Distance: 100m(Indoor); 400m(Outdoor) 
Storage: 2000 Barcodes 
Scanning Type: Bi-directional 
Light Source: 650nm LD 
Decoding Speed: 260scans/sec 
Indication: Buzzer & LED 
Depth of Field: 2mm-100mm(3.3mil); 2mm-350mm(10mil); 5mm-600mm(15.6mil); 10mm-1000mm(35mil) 
Resolution: 3.3mil 
Scanning Width: 30cm 
Printing Contrast: Reflection Coefficient>=25% 
Scanning Angle: rotor angel±30°，inclination± 45°，declination ± 60° 
Decoding Capability: UPC/EAN、with complementary UPC/EAN、Code128、 Code39、Code 39Full ASCII、Coda bar、industrial /Interleaved 2 of 5 Code93、MSI、Code11、ISBN、ISSN、China post、etc(optional)GS1 Data barCode32 Button Life: 8000,000 times 
Drop test ：2.0m fall to concrete 
Certificate ：CE，FCC，RoHS，IP54 
Compatible operation system: Windows XP/ Vista/ 7/ 8/ 8.1/ 10, MAC OS X/ Google Android, Linux. 
Supported languages: English / French / German / Spanish / Italian etc 20 different languages 
Application for Supermarkets, pharmacies, bakeries, book stores, fashion stores, tobacco shop and magazine kiosks etc. 

Package List: 
1 * Bar code Scanner 
1 * USB Cable 
1 * USB Flash Disk 
1 * Set-up Card 
1 * User Manual (English)
feature_bullets: 2.4G Wireless+USB 2.0 Wired Connection: Plug and Play, no need for any driver or software. Out of box ready to work when the USB receiver is plugged in. Compatible with Windows, Mac OS, Linux, as long as the device has USB port. Work for Wasp, Excel, InFlow,etc

Strong Recognition Ability with 300 scans/s: Can Automatically, Fast, and Precisely scan various types of 1D barcode, such as code 128, code 39, gs1and inverse code etc. Two working mode: Instant upload mode / storage mode. Scan and store barcodes when far away from the receiver, then update the data to your device.

Two Paring Mode: One-to-one mode, More-to-One mode. In the one-to-one mode,one scanner only transmit barcode to one usb receiver. In the More-to-One mode, multiple scanners can transmit data to one usb receiver. One usb receiver can connect to max 32 scanners

Built-in 1300mAh Rechargeable Li-ion Battery which can last approximately 7 Days or 40,000 times after 3-4 hours full charge. Wireless transmission distance is up to 328ft under barrier free environment. Withstands drops of 6ft. (1.8m) on concrete floor.

Over 300 Configuration Options：add prefix or suffix, delete character ,show & hide barcode type, and Turn on/ off buzzer etc. Perfect for all occasions, including logistics, shops, hospitals, warehouses, supermarkets, libraries, clothing stores, etc.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars181 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
